qas.question: What Boy Scout merit badge did Spielberg help develop?
When was Spielberg's merit badge launched?
Which major Spielberg movie character was a Boy Scout?
Which Spielberg movie showed its main character was a Boy Scout?

answers.text: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

qas.question: What was Indy's rank in Boy Scouts when shown in a movie?
What was the highest rank Indiana Jones made in his youth?
In what year did Spielberg start helping the Boy Scouts of America out?
In what year did the Boy Scouts give Spielberg their Distinguished Eagle Scout Award?
In what year did the second Indiana Jones movie come out?

context: Drawing from his own experiences in Scouting, Spielberg helped the Boy Scouts of America develop a merit badge in <a0_0>cinematography<a0_0/> in order to help promote filmmaking as a marketable skill. The badge was launched at the <a1_0><b6_0>1989<b6_0/><a1_0/> National Scout Jamboree, which Spielberg attended, and where he personally counseled many boys in their work on requirements. That same year, <b7_0><b8_0>1989<b8_0/><b7_0/>, saw the release of <a3_0>Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade<a3_0/>. The opening scene shows a teenage <a2_0>Indiana Jones<a2_0/> in scout uniform bearing the rank of a <a4_0><b5_0>Life Scout<b5_0/><a4_0/>. Spielberg stated he made Indiana Jones a Boy Scout in honor of his experience in Scouting. For his career accomplishments, service to others, and dedication to a new merit badge Spielberg was awarded the Distinguished Eagle Scout Award.
